name: roamer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who likes to move around and travel, especially without a clear idea of what they want to do: He's a bit of a roamer, so he could be anywhere in the country.
someone who moves from one country to another to live and work: Roamers move abroad with just a couple of suitcases on a regular basis in search of professional or personal opportunities.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is a roamer who needs freedom and adventure.I wanted to be a roamer, so I went up to Yorkshire. He is such a roamer that he has probably moved from the last address he gave me.There was a sign in the window that read "rooms for roamers".
